import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import movieAPI from '../../api/movieAPI' import MovieList from '../../components/MovieList/MovieList' import Credits from './Credits/Credits' import DetailVideos from './DetailVideos/DetailVideos' import { category } from '../../api/movieAPI' import './moviedetail.scss' const MovieDetail = () => { const {id} = useParams() const [movie,setMovie] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { const getMovieDetail = async () => { const item = await movieAPI.getDetail('movie',id) setMovie(item) } getMovieDetail() }, [id]) return (

{movie.title}

    {movie.genres && movie.genres.map((item) => { return
  • {item.name}
    • })}

{movie.overview}

CAST:

Similar

) } export default MovieDetail
